metadata.title: CVE-2017-14646 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The AP4_AvccAtom and AP4_HvccAtom classes in Bento4 version 1.5.0-617 donot properly validate data sizes, leading to a heap-based buffer over-readand application crash in AP4_DataBuffer::SetData in Core/Ap4DataBuffer.cpp.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
